{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17451v1", "title": "Functional $K$ Sample Problem via Multivariate Optimal Measure
  Transport-Based Permutation Test", "summary": "The null hypothesis of equality of distributions of functional data coming
from $K$ samples is considered. The proposed test statistic is multivariate and
its components are based on pairwise Cram\'{e}r von Mises comparisons of
empirical characteristic functionals. The significance of the test statistic is
evaluated via the novel multivariate permutation test, where the final single
$p$-value is computed using the discrete optimal measure transport. The
methodology is illustrated by real data on cumulative intraday returns of
Bitcoin.", "main_category": "math.ST", "categories": "math.ST,stat.TH", "published": "2025-04-24T11:30:46Z"}
